com.broudy.gcm.boundary.fxmlControllers

Class ClientInitializingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.enhanced.fxmlrelated.EnhancedFXMLController
      • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.fxmlControllers.ClientInitializingController

  • public class ClientInitializingController
extends EnhancedFXMLController
    Client's initial setup view controller overseeing client connection initialization.

    Created on the 4th of June, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ClientInitializingController.ConnectionDisconnectingService
      A Service class which handles all the disconnect requests as well as simulates waiting periods between various steps.
      private class  ClientInitializingController.ConnectionInitializingService
      A Service class which handles all the actual connection handling as well as simulates waiting periods between steps.
